prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has long, flowing fins and a sleek pink body.
Show me a Pokemon with a delicate appearance, featuring soft pastel colors and gentle movements.
Imagine a graceful Pokemon that thrives in the ocean, adorned with beautiful shades of pink and purple.
Design a unique aquatic creature with elegant shapes and intricate fins, perfect for deep-sea exploration.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the beauty of the sea, with a slender body and vibrant colors.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a mythical sea creature, with a captivating form and enchanting colors.
Give me an illustration of a Pokemon that is both charming and elusive, with soft, flowing features.
